Nema17.description: A standard NEMA 17 stepper motor. Shaft is aligned with the Z-axis. Mounting hole pattern (31mm square) is on the XY plane.

Nema23.description: A standard NEMA 23 stepper motor. Larger and higher torque than NEMA 17.

608 Bearing.description: Standard 608 series ball bearing (8mm ID, 22mm OD, 7mm width). Often used in skateboards and 3D printers.

M6 Screw.description: M6 metric machine screw. Hex socket head. Standard 1.0mm pitch.
